reviewText: mr. mathis live anywhere sounds wonderful. since I danced my first close dance to 'chances are' my first love and johnny mathis have been in my heart and ear.  long live johnny mathis.
Johnny Mathis live in Chicago and the legendary Johnny Mathis are the same show . The sound  & picture are good buy one or the other .
I LOVE JOHNNY MATHIS....  I WENT TO HIGH SCHOOL WITH HIM.  WE DANCED ALOT AT THE SCHOOL DANCES.
